author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: بِنَفْسِكَ وَبِما أَنْتَ عَلَيْهِ بِأَنْ تَجْعَلَنِي ناصِرًا لأمْرِكَ وَناطِقًا بِثَنَائِكَ وَمُقْبِلاً إِلى حَرَمِ عِزِّكَ وَمُنْقَطِعًا عَمَّا سِواكَ، لا إِلهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ المُقْتَدِرُ العَزِيزْ الحَكِيمُ.
translation: I beseech Thee, by Thyself and by whatsoever is of Thee, to grant that I may help Thy Cause and speak of Thy praise, and set my heart on the sanctuary of Thy glory, and detach myself from all that pertaineth not unto Thee. No God is there beside Thee, the God of power, the God of glory and wisdom.
